title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example displays excessive flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically, there should not be excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window vertically only.
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
